Metadata.title: AICO - AI Employee Framework
Metadata.description: Build AI teams in seconds, start working immediately. Manage AI collaborators like managing employees.

hero.title: Build AI Teams in Seconds
hero.subtitle: AI Employee Framework - Manage AI collaborators like managing employees

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.description: Initialize your project and add AI employees in one command

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Pre-built AI capabilities for common tasks

employees.title: Employees
employees.description: Ready-to-use AI team members with specialized skills

cli.title: CLI
cli.description: Simple command-line interface for managing your AI team

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Completely open source and free to use.

SkillsPage.title: Skills
SkillsPage.description: Browse available AI skills and add them to your project with one click

init.description: Initialize PM environment by creating constitution document from template.

brainstorming.description: Guide users through structured dialogue to transform vague ideas into clear, actionable product concepts.

clarification.description: Resolve requirement ambiguities through structured questioning with recommended options.

user-story-writing.description: Transform requirements into well-structured User Stories with Given/When/Then acceptance criteria.

prd-writing.description: Create comprehensive Product Requirements Documents defining what to build and why.

acceptance-criteria.description: Define clear, testable acceptance criteria using Given/When/Then (Gherkin) format.

competitor-analysis.description: Research and analyze competitors with feature comparison and actionable recommendations.

story-acceptance.description: Verify and close stories after frontend/backend tasks are completed.

init.description: Initialize frontend environment by creating design system and constraints documents.

style-extraction.description: Extract design tokens from reference website or screenshot to create project design system.

design.description: Transform PRD or story into complete page/component designs with ASCII layouts and specs.

task-breakdown.description: Break down PM story into frontend tasks following UI development order.

plan.description: Create atomic implementation plan for a single frontend task with exact code and verification.

implement.description: Execute frontend implementation with TDD. Write failing test first, then implement.

init.description: Initialize backend environment by creating constraints document from template.

task-breakdown.description: Break down PM story into backend tasks following layered architecture order.

plan.description: Create atomic implementation plan for a single backend task with TDD and verification.

implement.description: Execute backend implementation with TDD. Write failing test first, then implement.

code-review.description: Request structured code review to catch correctness, security, performance, and readability issues.

subagent-driven.description: Execute implementation plan by dispatching fresh subagent per task with two-stage review.

worktree.description: Create isolated git worktree for feature development with baseline test verification.

EmployeesPage.title: Employees
EmployeesPage.description: Browse available AI employees and add them to your team with one click

pm.description: Product research, requirement analysis, user story writing, and version planning

frontend.description: Full-stack frontend development: design system, page design, task breakdown, implementation

backend.description: Full-stack backend development: API design, database, business logic, TDD, and system architecture

Docs.title: aico Documentation
Docs.description: aico is an AI employee framework that lets you manage AI collaborators like managing employees.
Docs.whatIsAicoDesc: aico (AI Company) provides a new way to organize and use AI capabilities. By packaging AI capabilities as "employees", you can quickly build a professional AI team.
Docs.quickStartDesc: Get started with aico in just three steps:
Docs.startUsingDesc: Use skills and commands in Claude Code

Footer.tagline: AI Employee Framework - Build AI teams in seconds.
